26.title: Services Tracing
26.query:
fetch dt.entity.service

| fieldsAdd 
    entityId = toString(id)
| fieldsAdd
    id,
    entityId,
    entity.name,
    serviceType,
    lifetime,
    lifeTimeEndMillis = unixMillisFromTimestamp(lifetime[end])

| lookup [
    fetch dt.davis.events.snapshots
    | filter in(affected_entity_type, "dt.entity.service")
    | expand affected_entity_ids
    |dedup event.id, sort: {timestamp desc}
    | filter event.status == "ACTIVE"
    | fieldsAdd healthIndicators =  if(in(event.type,{"SERVICE_ERROR_RATE_INCREASED", "SERVICE_SLOWDOWN", "SERVICE_UNEXPECTED_HIGH_LOAD", "SERVICE_UNEXPECTED_LOW_LOAD", "CUSTOM_ALERT"}),
                record(event.id, event.date, event.description, event.group)) 
    | summarize {healthIndicators = arrayRemoveNulls(collectArray(healthIndicators)), by:{affected_entity_ids}}],
                sourceField : id, lookupField: affected_entity_ids, fields: {healthIndicators}, executionOrder: leftFirst
    | sort arraySize(coalesce(healthIndicators, array())) desc
    

| fieldsAdd runs_on_from_attr = entityAttr(id, "runs_on", type: "dt.entity.service")
| fieldsAdd pg_id = runs_on_from_attr[dt.entity.process_group]
| fieldsAdd pg_name = entityName(pg_id, type: "dt.entity.process_group")
| fieldsAdd entityAttr(id, "tags", type: "dt.entity.service"),
            entityAttr(id, "softwareTechnologies", type: "dt.entity.service"),
            entityAttr(id, "serviceDetectionAttributes", type: "dt.entity.service"),
            entityAttr(id, "publicCloudRegion", type: "dt.entity.service")

| fieldsAdd icon_from_attr = entityAttr(id, "icon", type: "dt.entity.service")
| fieldsAdd entity = record(entityId = id, displayName = entity.name, lifetimeEndMillis = unixMillisFromTimestamp(lifetime[end]),
            extraInfo = if(serviceType == "UNIFIED", toString(serviceDetectionAttributes), else: concat(pg_name)),
            icon = icon_from_attr[primaryIconType])

| fields HealthAlerts = healthIndicators, Service = entity[displayName]
| fieldsAdd HealthAlerts = if(isNull(HealthAlerts), "ðŸŸ© Healthy", else: "ðŸŸ¥ Unhealthy")

| sort Service asc

| join [fetch dt.entity.service
| expand managementZones
| filter managementZones == $ManagementZone
| fieldsAdd Service = entity.name],
  on: {left[Service] == right[Service]}
| dedup Service
|lookup[timeseries {  `Response Time/ Latency` = percentile(dt.service.request.response_time, 90)},
                       by:{ dt.entity.service }
| fieldsAdd Service = entityName(dt.entity.service)
| fieldsAdd `Response Time/ Latency` = arrayAvg(`Response Time/ Latency`)], 
  lookupField:Service, 
  SourceField:Service, 
  Fields: {`Response Time/ Latency`}

|lookup[timeseries {`Request Volume` = sum(dt.service.request.count)}, by: { dt.entity.service }

| fieldsAdd Service = entityName(dt.entity.service) 
| fieldsAdd `Request Volume` = arraySum(`Request Volume`)
], lookupField:Service, SourceField: Service, Fields: `Request Volume`


|lookup[timeseries {
  err5xx = sum(
              dt.service.request.count,
              filter:{ http.response.status_code >= 500
                       AND http.response.status_code <= 599 })
}, by: {dt.entity.service}    

| fieldsAdd Service = entityName(dt.entity.service)
| fieldsAdd err5xx = arraySum(err5xx)
], lookupField:Service, SourceField: Service, Fields: {err5xx}
| fieldsAdd err5xx = if(isNull(err5xx), 0, else: err5xx)

|lookup[timeseries {
  err4xx = sum(
              dt.service.request.count,
              filter:{ http.response.status_code >= 400
                       AND http.response.status_code <= 499 })
}, by: {dt.entity.service}    

| fieldsAdd Service = entityName(dt.entity.service)
| fieldsAdd err4xx = arraySum(err4xx)
], lookupField:Service, SourceField: Service, Fields: {err4xx}

| fieldsAdd err4xx = if(isNull(err4xx), 0, else: err4xx)
| fieldsAdd err4xx = if((err4xx>10*err5xx), 0, else: err4xx) 
| fieldsAdd `Request Volume` = if(isNull(`Request Volume`), 0, else: `Request Volume`)
| fieldsAdd `Response Time/ Latency` = if(isNull(`Response Time/ Latency`), 0, else: `Response Time/ Latency`)

| fieldsAdd `HTTP Error Rate (%)` = if(`Request Volume` > 100 AND (err5xx + err4xx)< `Request Volume`, ((err5xx + err4xx) / `Request Volume`) * 100.0, else: 0.0)
| fieldsAdd `Reliability (%)`= 100 - `HTTP Error Rate (%)`
| fields Service, HealthAlerts, `Reliability (%)`,`HTTP Error Rate (%)`,`Request Volume`, `Response Time/ Latency`
